price: Gospodara nebesa i Zemlje i onoga što je između njih – ako čvrsto vjerujete,
arabic: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā in kuntum mūqinīna
